dtliExcerpt: This new production, directed by Thomas Kail, with Josh Groban as the titular demon barber and Annaleigh Ashford as Mrs. Lovett, is both intimate and grand, managing to make Sondheim's already perfect score feel somehow even more urgent and alive.
